pictbridge: Yes, DPOF (Digital Print Order Format), PictBridge
flashmodes: Fill-flash, Red-eye reduction, Rear curtain with sync, Rear curtain with slow sync, Slow sync, Slow sync with red-eye reduction
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Phase Detect, Multi-Area, Selective Single Point, Tracking
